name: 3 Foot Ninja
description: Help little ninja defeat enemies and collect all the scrolls to move to the next level.

name: 3 Foot Ninja II
description: Take an amazing journey in a far away place. Fight the evil enemies and return the Princess to the King of the southern lands.

name: Acid Factory
description: Help harry escape the horrors of his acid-flooded factory.

controls.Z: Shoot (you have pick up the gun first!)

name: Acno's Energizer
description: Use Acno to push the red and grey balls into the energizer then jump into it to go to next level.

controls.space: Hold to remove dirt without moving

name: Alex in Danger
description: Get to the doorway at the top of each level. Collect all the gems you can along the way. Watch out for hedgehogs, snowmen and other vicious creatures.

name: Alien Attack
description: Defend your Mars base and eliminate all alien ships - avoid friendly fire at all cost!

name: Alien Clones
description: Be fast and accurate - defend yourself from the onslaught of alien clones.

name: All Out
description: Turn all the lights out to complete a level - if you get stuck click the solve button.

name: Alphattack
description: Can you save the planet from the alpha bombs? Defeat the threat before our cities are destroyed!

name: Anagrammatic
description: Challenge the world to a battle of anagram solving action! Find the longest word possible within the time limit.

controls.mouse-left: Click the letters to form a word.

name: Aqua Energizer
description: Help Aqua solve the underwater puzzles by pushing the red flashing balls into energizer.

controls.space: Hold to remove dirt without moving

name: Aquanaut
description: Explore underwater worlds, avoid the deadly creatures and find the treasure chest in each level!

name: Armada Tanks
description: Defend your military base and defeat all of your enemies! Purchase upgrades to improve your tank's weapons and equipment!

name: Ask Guru Joe
description: Are you lacking something in life? Find answers to any question using Guru Joe's mystical powers.

controls.null: Type in your questions and press enter

name: Baby Blimp
description:
As we all know babies are delivered by storks! They work in a huge Blimp floating around in the sky.
In Baby Blimp you are the stork manager, responsible for the baby production line as well as the baby distribution above several towns and cities.

name: Backfire
description: Click, hold and rotate to deflect the balls fired at you to destroy the turrets.

controls.null: Click, hold and rotate to deflect the balls.

name: Bad Apple
description: A fun Minesweeper style game - try to avoid clicking on the bad apples.

name: Balance
description: Grab your racquet and head to the courts. Don't let the other sports catch you off guard!

name: Bank Robber
description: Assemble a crack team to infiltrate the bank and make off with the swag.

name: Base Jumping
description: Base Jump against the best in the world. Work your way through the leagues and challenge the King.

name: Baseball
description: It is bottom of the ninth; rally your team to win the game with only 3 outs left

name: Battle Pong
description: Pong with a difference - destroy your opponent to win the game!

name: Battleships
description: Can you be the savior and destroy the enemy fleet?

name: Bee Boxing
description: Use your swarm of bees to knock down the opposition hive.

controls.mouse: Click on opponents hive to attack.

name: Big Jump Challenge
description: Grab as much air as you can, pull off tricks and land it!

name: Black Knight
description: The King has created a new way of getting taxes from his people. Are you up to the challenge?

name: Blair The Motivator
description: Can you help Tony motivate the party into shape?

name: Blobs
description: Can you jump all the blobs and have one left standing to complete the level?

controls.mouse-left: Drag blobs to an empty space

name: Blobs 2
description: Blobs bigger and better. Can you solve the levels and have one blob left?

controls.mouse-left: Drag blobs to an empty space

name: Bloomin' Gardens
description: Put your green fingers to the test! Can you keep the garden manageable?

controls.mouse-left: Drag a plant to an empty space

name: Blox Forever
description: Can you get your brain around matching all of the blox together to clear each level.

name: Bloxorz
description: Get the block to fall into the square hole to progress to the next level…

name: Board
description: The race is on to get to the bottom of the board and grab as many points as possible.

controls.mouse-left: Hold to build up jump power, release to jump

name: Bomba
description: Guide Bomba to the stars, make sure you don't touch the walls or anything moving!

name: Boom Volleyball
description: Beach volleyball with an added BOOM!

name: BP Gas Mania
description: Keep your customers happy and serve them as soon as possible!

name: Bubble Trouble
description: Are you up the challenge to clear all the bubbles and get yourself out of trouble?

name: Bug On A Wire
description: Can you guide your bug safely home and avoid getting eaten?

name: Bullseye
description: Can you get from 501 to 0 in the fastest possible time?

controls.mouse-left: On Blue Button to set Horizontal and again to set Vertical.

name: Bunch
description: Bunch the balls and collect the points.

name: Bush Aerobics
description: Help President Bush get fit and ready for the sweetest day of his life.

controls.mouse-left: The buttons to perform the different exercises.

name: Bush Shoot-Out
description: Make sure that Bush and Condoleezza get out of the White House alive!

name: Cable Capers 2
description: Can you help Arnold the Cable Fitter escape the underground maze that he has fallen into?

name: Candy and Clyde
description: Are you naughty or nice? The choice is yours.

name: Cannon Blast
description: Blast all of the enemy boats into Davy Jones' Locker.

controls.null: White Circle shows which cannon is active

name: Canyon Glider
description: Can you navigate the canyon and get the best score possible?

name: Canyon Shooter
description: Fight your way through the canyons taking out the enemy on the way down. Look out for upgrades and good luck.

name: Caravan Racers
description: Race on four challenging tracks and make your caravan the first across the line.

name: Caveman
description: Save your girlfriend from the evil prehistoric monsters!

name: Cell Out
description: Hit the white balls with your white ring, avoiding the red balls.

controls.mouse-left: On edge of green ring to make it jump

name: Challenge Churchil
description: Take to the air in a hot air balloon in a race against the Churchill bus to cover the country!

name: Chasm
description: Guide Joe around the Chasm and work out how to give the town water.

name: Cheese Dreams
description: Help the Moon escape from the ship run by Space Mice!

name: Cherie 'Disco' Blair
description: Make Cherie dance.

name: Chick Flick
description: It is too soon to leave the nest, but try telling that to adventurous chicks. Help the squirrels get them safely home.

name: Clash N Slash
description: Protect your home planet from the endless onslaught of the enemy armarda!

name: Classroom Pilot
description: Design your paper plane and aim for the blackboard to escape the lesson!

name: Click & Slide
description: Place the pieces in the correct order to rebuild the original image.

controls.mouse-left: The square you want to move

name: Coign of Vantage
description: Rotate the playing field with your mouse and recreate the images before the time runs out!

name: Commander n Chief
description: Prove that your candidate is tough enough to be the next Commander in Chief.  Join in the largest USA Presidential election poll.

name: Commando
description: Defend the Allies from the scourge of Europe. Can you stem the tide of the enemy invasion?

controls.null: You can also customise the controls in the options menu.

name: Commando 2
description: After successfully defending the Allies in Europe our Hero continues the battle where the original smash hit game Commando left off, following the action to the Far East! More missions, more enemies, more explosions, bigger artillery.

name: Commando 2 Trailer
description: View the trailer for the the upcoming Commando 2 game.  Exploding onto the Internet where the original smash hit game Commando left off.  More missions, more enemies, more explosions, bigger artillery.

name: Corn Pops Challenge
description: Play these super-awesome challenges, unlock the golden cereal pieces and win 1000 bonus points! So what are you waiting for?

name: Couronne Deluxe
description: Beat your opponents by out playing and blocking their shots.

name: Crashdown
description: Try to clear the squares as quickly as you possibly can.

controls.mouse: Click groups of the same coloured squares as quickly as possible.

name: Criss Cross Rally
description: Race to the finish line on your jetski. Pick up Apple Jacks to collect bonus points.

name: Crossword Daily
description: Complete the crossword as quickly as you can.

name: Cube Buster
description: Clear the squares and become the quickest cube buster there is!

controls.mouse: Click on groups of 3 or more same colored squares.

name: Cyber Mice Party
description: Rescue all the mice by showing them the way to the cheese.

controls.mouse-left: Click to drag items playing field to guide your mouse to the cheese.

name: Dancing Blair
description: Make Tony Blair dance like you have never seen him before.

controls.mouse-left: Click on buttons to select dance moves, music, dance floor etc.

name: Dancing Bush
description: President Bush struts his stuff on the dancefloor as he gets down and boogies.

controls.mouse-left: Click on buttons to select dance moves, music, dance floor etc.

name: Dancing Hillary
description: Check out Hillary's moves!

controls.mouse-left: Click on buttons to select dance moves, music, dance floor etc.

name: Dancing Palin
description: Check out Palin's moves!

controls.mouse-left: Click on buttons to select dance moves, music, dance floor etc.

name: David
description: Help David find the Lost Sheep and avoid the rampaging wild animals

name: Deep Freeze
description: Freeze your enemies with your water gun and stop the bad guys from ruining Christmas.

name: Defenders
description: Knockout all your opponents and win the world title.

name: Desert Ambush
description: An ancient tomb has been discovered by the military in Lybia. Your mission is to find the tomb and secure the area for investigation... proceed with caution.

name: Detonator
description: Help Walter defuse all the bombs.

name: Digital Switch
description: Switches the bots around to collect the colored coins.

controls.mouse-left: Click on the arrows to switch the bots around.

name: Dino Run
description: Run for your life and escape the oncoming wall of doom and extinction!

name: Dirk Valentine
description: Take control of Britain's Greatest Explorer and Spy and save Europe from Baron Battenberg's Steam Powered War Machines!

name: Disc Golf
description: Throw the disc into the cage in as few throws as possible.

controls.mouse-left: Click and hold on disc, drag to select power and angle. Release to throw.

name: Doodle
description: Is the pencil mightier than the sword? Bring your doodle to life and battle the enemy erasers.

name: Dr Compactor
description: Defend your secret base in the city dump with your Arm of Doom.

name: Dune Buggy
description: Perform stunts to earn points, but beware of the hazard filled levels!

name: Egg Run
description: Collect the twig and get to the base of the ladder in as few moves as possible.

controls.mouse-left: Click on egg, drag back and release to launch.

name: Elastic Soccer
description: Score as many goals as you can to fight the tough opposition.

controls.mouse-left: Pull back and release to shoot

name: Electro Air Hockey
description: Hit the puck into your opponent's goal on the opposite side of the table to score a point, first to 7 wins the game.

controls.mouse: Move mallet. The speed you move the mallet determines the strength

name: Empty Santa's Sack
description: Knock the presents out of the Elves hands.

name: Evac
description: Rescue all the stranded soldiers on the designated pads located throughout the hostile terrain and return them safely to their home base.

name: Exile
description: Help save the world from the shroud of evil and defeat the armies of Dark Lord Morloran.

name: Extreme Pamplona
description: Play 'Extreme Pamplona' game over 5 action packed levels!

name: Feed Me
description: Guide the venus fly trap safely through the greenhouse avoiding dangerous thorns and poisonous insects

name: Field Goal
description: Kick the ball through the goal posts to complete the levels.

name: Final Fortress
description: The enemy is approaching our city and there is little time left. You are all that stands in the way. You must stand your ground!

controls.null: Click on BUILD UNITS to buy new units

name: Final Ninja
description: Take control of the Final Ninja Takeshi and use your ninja skills to overcome his arch nemesis Akuma.

name: Fireworks
description: Click on the fireworks to set them off and see the New Year in with a bang!

controls.mouse-left: = Click on the fireworks to set them off.

name: Flatbread Express
description: Create, cook and serve up delicious food for the hungry customers.

controls.mouse-left: = Click and drag ingredients onto the flatbread

name: Flingo
description: Navigate all the levels safely, avoiding a wide range of hazards in this underwater adventure!

name: Free Kick Challenge
description: Beat the goal keeper and score as many goals as you can!

controls.mouse: To set Pictch, Power, Swerve and Direction

name: Frost Bite
description: Take on enemies with your Grappling Gun whilst you climb to the top of the frosty mountains and raise the victory flag!

name: Fruit Smash
description: Smash up the fruit, using all the bonuses you can.

controls.mouse-left: To select 2 neighbouring fruits to swap them

name: Galactic Goobers
description: Shoot down all the enemy spacecraft to proceed to next level!!

name: Galactic Warrior
description: Defeat the Aliens to get to the Galactic Big Boss.

name: Get Rooney Fit
description: Help Wayne Rooney get fit for the 2006 World Championship

controls.mouse-left: The buttons to perform the different exercises.

name: Governor of Poker
description: Win all your games in your hometown and then the whole of Texas to become the Governor of Poker!

name: Gravity
description: Guide your spaceship safely through all of the missions.

name: Gun Run
description: Shoot Everything to survive, the longer you make it, the more points you get.

controls.space: Jump, tap twice to double jump

name: Gyroball
description: Navigate your gyroball to the glowing goal of each level without falling off the platforms.

name: Hangaroo
description: Guess the hidden phrase to complete a level.

name: Hangaroo 2
description: Guess the hidden phrase to complete a level.

name: Hansen's Eyebrows
description: Use Hansen's eyebrows as your pinball flippers in this world cup pinball game.

name: Heli Attack 2
description: Helicopters come at you in waves, your mission is to take as many choppers down as possible. Pick up weapons and upgrades being dropped by your allies.

name: Heli Attack 3
description: Destroy all enemy units to progress through snow, jungle, canyon lands and lab levels... featuring over 30 weapons.

name: Hen Coops
description: Find the hidden Easter Eggs, how many rounds can you go?

name: Hexxagon
description: Your aim is to take over the board. Moving to a space next to another piece will transform them into yours!

name: Hip-Hop Debate
description: Bush and Kerry battle hip-hop style. Place your vote in the biggest election poll ever taken. Once you've seen all their moves vote for your favorite candidate.

name: Hostile Skies
description: You're a fighter ace, complete a series of dangerous missions then challenge the evil 'Red Baron' for supremacy of the skies!

name: Hot Air
description: Collect the stars and get your balloon through the perilous levels safely.

name: Hot Air 2
description: Collect the stars and get your balloon through the perilous levels safely.

name: Ice Breakout
description: Clear all the ice blocks to go the next level.

name: Ice Slide
description: Catapult your favourite polar animal as far as you can. Avoid the snowy hazards.

name: Skyboard
description: Follow the leader and repeat the dance moves, can you impress Armando?

name: In The Doghouse
description: Complete each level by moving the tiles to get the puppy to the kitchen!

name: Jigsaw - Car
description: Complete the picture puzzle.

controls.mouse: Move to correct position, release to place

name: Jigsaw - Ocean
description: Complete the picture puzzle.

controls.mouse: Move to correct position, release to place

name: Jingo
description: Group together 'Jingos' of the same colour and help free them from the Jelly Matrix

name: Kerry Workout
description: Help Kerry into shape with some advanced aerobics.

name: Kindergarten
description: Take care of all the babies to help your kindergarten grow and be successful.

name: King of the Hill
description: Use your castle's weapons to protect yourself from the enemy, and become King of the Hill.

controls.mouse-left: Hold and drag to fire catapults

name: KingPin Bowling
description: Click 'New Game' to play. To bowl click and hold on the 'GO' button. The closer you get to the yellow mark the more accurate you will be.

controls.mouse-left: Hold on the "Go" button, then release at the yellow mark

name: Kung Fu Statesmen
description: Guide your MP through the levels avoiding troublesome protesters, collecting and destroying the election promises they made in 1997.

name: Lamb Chop Drop
description: Freefall through the air collecting money as you go.

name: Letter Lasso
description: Locate all the words in the puzzle, in the shortest possible time.

controls.mouse-left: Circle the word you are looking for

name: Love's Arrow
description: Take aim with Cupids arrow and shoot down the lonely hearts club this Valentines Day.

controls.mouse-left: Click and drag bowstring to aim, release to shoot arrow.

name: Lunar Command
description: Save the lunar population by protecting the moon base from a vicious alien attack.

name: Magic Balls
description: Group  two or more balls of the same color  to remove them.

name: Magic Pen
description: Move the red ball by drawing objects to push it around. Collect the flags with the red ball to complete each level.

name: Mallet Mania
description: Use your mallet and get the ball to the end of the tricky courses avoiding the traps!

name: Mars Patrol
description: Solve and complete all levels.

name: Merlin's Christmas
description: Santa's sleigh has been sabotaged and only you are capable of rescuing the presents and saving Christmas!

name: Merry Christmas
description: Get loads of presents.

controls.mouse: Click feverishly to produce the most presents

name: Mini Golf
description: Complete all 18 holes in as few strokes as possible.

name: Mini Soccer
description: Shoot your way to victory. Play in Friendlies or compete in a tournament and go for Gold.

name: Miniclip Rally
description: 3 of your favorite Miniclip friends have challenged each other to race it out on their home tracks. Choose a vehicle and race your hearts out. (Some vehicles are more suited to certain tracks - but it all depends on your driving style!)

name: Mission Mars
description: Level the city to secure your landing!

name: Mister Easter
description: Use your handy trampoline to get as many eggs into the egg baskets. Watch out for the stinkers!

name: Monkey Lander
description: The aim is to collect all the bananas and land safely on the platform before your fuel runs out.

name: Monkey Snowfight
description: Whack the other monkey with snow and 'nana bombs. Pick up bonuses to stay longer in the game.

name: Monster Basher
description: The more monsters you hit the more points you score. Miss 10 monsters and lose a life.

name: Monster Sumo
description: Win 2 out of 3 games to proceed to next level!

name: Monster Truck
description: Crush cars and perform incredible stunts in this action packed monster truck thriller.

name: Moonshadow
description: Use your stealth to infiltrate a seemingly ordinary Warehouse compound. Do you have what it takes to become a Super-Spy?

name: MotherLoad
description: Use your digger to excavate as much ore as possible. Use the money you earn to upgrade your digger and move deeper and deeper underground, to unearth the mysteries from below.

controls.mouse: Select menus to buy and sell

name: Mountain Bike
description: Perform crazy stunts in this downhill mountain bike racer!

controls.left_right: Tilt the bike left and right

name: Movie Munchies
description: Help Stella serve the customers as fast as possible.

controls.123: Use the Number Keys to serve the customers.

name: Mr Bounce
description: Take control of Mr. Bounce and make your way through 5 colorful and challenging worlds.

name: Mr Men Pinball
description: Activate multiple targets for bonus points in Mr Bump Pinball!

controls.arrows: Down to launch the ball, left and right to flip

name: Music Cube
description: Solve the picture clues to identify the artists, albums and songs from the 1980s, 1990s and 2000s!

controls.null: Type your answers in the box provided

name: Narnia Prince Caspian
description: Train as a soldier of the Narnia Army and help rescue Narnia from the Telmarines

name: NFL Conga Chaos
description: Hop into your NFLRZ battle mobile and use spacebar to firepower balls at the oncoming Blitz Bots. How many Blitz Bots can you take down?

name: NFL lateral Collateral
description: It’s a broken play with no time left! This is your last chance to win the game! How many touchdowns can you score?

name: Nordic Chill
description: Compete in 4 winter sports events in this challenging game.

name: Numbskull
description: Solve the puzzles and get the skull safely back to his body.

controls.mouse-left: Click and drag to rotate an area.

name: Off The Rails
description: Navigate your handcar through the levels avoiding the obstacles blocking your path.

name: One Man Band
description: Drag the instruments onto the stage and build your very own one man band!

controls.mouse-left: = Drag and Drop instruments onto the stage

name: Onekey
description: You cannot control the character but use the [SPACE] key to control objects around him, to get him to the end of the level!

name: Overkill Apache
description: Take control of your Apache and take down the enemy forces!

name: Paintball
description: Shoot all the yellow faces to score maximum points and advance to next level.

name: Panik in Chocoland
description: Guide Panik through the factory collecting all the bombs.

name: Papa Louie
description: Help Papa Louie fight the mutant pizzas in over a dozen worlds of Italian cuisine.

controls.updown: Press Down over Pizza Box to pick up

name: Parachute Plunder
description: Fly the parachute through the islands to land safely.

name: Park a Lot
description: Park cars in the numbered spaces. When a customer returns collect the car and drive it to the exit.

name: Park a Lot 2
description: Park cars in the numbered spaces. When a customer returns collect the car and drive it to the exit.

name: Peanut
description: Flick as many nuts into the goal as possible.

name: Pearl Diver
description: Grab your mask and head for the sea bed. Collect as much treasure and pearls as you can and get back to the boat before your air runs out. Watch out for the sharks!

name: Pebble Dash
description: Throw the pebble as far as you can! There are 15 locations waiting for you! Good Luck!

controls.mouse-right: Set angle and power to throw

name: Pencak Silat
description: At the dawn of 20th century, chaos reigns. You must fight to restore order.

name: Penguin Arcade
description: The aim is to knock as many penguins as possible back into the pool!

name: Penguin Push
description: Push all the ice blocks into the yellow holes.

name: Pest Control
description: Use the fly swatter to get rid of all the bugs!

name: Phantom Mansion
description: Guide Hector around the rooms and avoid the Skeletons and Zombies

name: Pharaoh's Tomb
description: Collect as much gold as you can, avoid monsters and traps and drink healing potions to cure wounds. Get out of the Tomb as fast as you can...alive!

name: Ping Pong
description: Bounce the ball as many times as you can. How long can you go?

name: Piranhas
description: Guide Penny through the caves collecting keys and avoiding the deadly traps. Get to the trap door before your air runs out to complete the level.

name: Pod Panic
description: An alien invasion threatens the Universe. Save humanity by destroying the waves of aliens.

name: Polar Rescue
description: Try to get to the end and defeat the ice giant.

name: Present Panic
description: Catch the presents to ensure Christmas isn't spoilt.

name: President Knockout
description: Knock the opponent out of the election.

name: Presidential Paintball
description: Hillary, Obama, Giuliani & more play paintball for the USA Presidency!

name: Presidential Pound
description: Knock the opponent out of the election.

name: Pressure Shot
description: Can Europe hold up under the pressure in the 2004 Ryder Cup?

name: Puker
description: Find somewhere safe to chuck up before everyone sees what a great big puker you are...

name: Rabbid Droppings
description: Fire plungers at the Rabbids to knock them off the ledge. Nudge them as they fall to get maximum points.

name: Raft Wars
description: Team up with your Brother and defend your treasure from the bad guys!

name: Rails of War
description:
Guide your War Train into battle and destroy the enemy who is taking control of your precious land.


The best war trains will be at your disposal starting with the Saddle Tank. Once proven that you are capable, bigger and stronger trains will be yours to fight with.
Upgrade to the full version for:
- More Weapons
- More Trains
- More Enemies
- More Maps
- Map Editor

name: Red Beard
description: Activate the lifts and platforms by collecting the matching colored balls. Collect the gold to complete the level.

name: Red Bugs Puzzle
description: Clear the path for the red bug to reach the end of each level. Beware of the beetles! They eat red bugs and raspberries!

name: Reel Gold
description: Make your fortune in the Hills, clear your pitch before the time runs out and the Gold Rush begins!

name: Rigelian Hotshots
description: Collecting all the thrill suckers to earn extra points. Hitting walls or getting caught in traps gets you killed.

name: Ringshot
description: Activate the rings on the grid with matching colored orbs!

name: Rocketman
description: Help Rocketman save his girlfriend from the evil robot's clutches.

name: Rockstarter
description: Create your own rock band.

controls.mouse: Add band members, backgrounds and lighting

name: Roly Poly
description: Poly the hedgehog likes a challenge. Roll him around the 30 dizzying mazes to give him the buzz he desires!

controls.mouse-left: Drag and rotate to move Poly

name: Rooftop-Hop
description: Help Santa deliver all the presents in time for Christmas day!

controls.mouse-left: Click on Santa, drag back and release to launch.

name: Royal Rampage
description: Save London town from the terrorists bent on the destruction of democracy.

name: Rugby Challenge
description: Convert all the tries.

name: Rural Racer
description: Finish 8 laps in first place to progress to the next level.

name: Samsung Football
description: Score as many points as you can in two minutes, with tricks and special moves!

controls.mouse-left: = Keep the ball in the air

name: Samurai Sam
description: Take revenge on the Dark Ninja, but watch out for his minions of evil as you navigate hazardous traps!

name: Samurai Warrior
description: Defeat the renegades before they defeat you.

name: Sandman
description: Help the sleepwalkers escape from the land of nod using your powers of sand!

name: Santa Ski Jump
description: Collect enough Stars over three jumps to progress to the next round.

controls.space: Press and hold to set style, release to set speed

name: Santa's Cannon
description: Help Santa Deliver the Presents across the world with his cannon.

name: Santa's Factory
description: Collect the presents in your sack before they hit the floor. Retro gaming galore!

name: Scraper Caper
description: Scale the skyscrapers collecting your lunch and avoiding the dangers as you go. Everyone deserves a lunch break!

name: Scribble
description: Help the Ink Blots get through the levels by drawing bridges, ramps and caging the enemies

controls.mouse: Click and Drag to draw lines

name: Sheep Game
description: Get the sheep into the pen.

controls.mouse: Use mouse to herd sheep into pen

name: Sheepish
description: Get the sheep across the road and into a pen.

controls.arrows: Move your sheep across the river

name: Sheriff Tripeaks
description: This is a game of classic Tripeaks. You need to find the card with one number above or one number below the show card. You only get three chances to undo your move in one game. There are 25 challenging levels to get through - all of them locked, save the first one. Try to earn the gold star in every level.

controls.mouse: Click on a card one number above or one number below the show card

name: Shootin' Hoops
description: Get past the other players and shoot a basket to win.

name: Shove It
description: Help Vincent to get all the blue blocks onto the yellow spots.

controls.arrows: Push all the blue blocks onto the yellow spots

name: Silversphere
description: Get the Silver Sphere in to the Blue Vortex before the time runs out.

name: Simon Says
description: Do what Simon Says.

controls.mouse: Click on the correct sequence of lights

name: Skies of War
description: Become the most important pilot of the rebel army and overcome the enemy armies!

name: Skywire 2
description: Take control of the cable car and get the passengers to their destination safely

name: Slacking
description: Eat, drink and avoid work at all costs.

name: Sling
description: Help Sling recapture the missing element and get Oozeville Power Plant working again.

name: Slingfire
description: Help Sling recapture the missing elements and get Oozeville Power Plant working again.

name: Small Fry
description: Pick up the Small Fry and try to get them to the end of the level safely

name: Smashing
description: Destroy all the blocks to advance to the next level. More than 50 levels of brick-smashing fun!

controls.mouse-left: Click to release balls and activate weapons if collected

name: Snake
description: Collect all of the red stars to get points, collect the blue question marks for special bonuses.

name: Snap n Spooky
description: Find matching cards to release the ghosts as fast as you can!

name: Sniper
description: Shoot all the terrorists to save the Dutch Embassy.

name: Snow Day
description: Make sure the schools stay closed by keeping the snow clouds cold.

name: Snow Drift
description: Take control of Yeti and knock out monsters with your ice slide!

name: Snow Line
description: Help Santa Claus collect the presents ready for delivery on Christmas Eve.

controls.mouse-left: Click the green play button to get Santa going.

name: Snowman Stacker
description: Toss and stack snowballs to make the tallest snowman.

controls.mouse-left: Set toss angle, set strength, release to throw

name: Soap Bubble
description: Get your Bubble through the mine safely.

name: Soap Bubble 2
description: Guide the soap bubble safely through the mysterious underground factory.

name: Space Escape
description: Guide your space ship cross the obstacle filled courses.

name: Space Fighter
description: Destroy all the Meteors before they destroy you.

name: Space Hopper
description: Hop from planet to planet collecting bonuses and avoiding the alien life forms

name: SQRL Golf
description: Get a squirrely hole in one!

controls.mouse-left: Click and drag to select squirrel

name: SQRL Golf 2
description: Get a squirrely hole in one!

controls.mouse-left: Click and drag to select squirrel

name: Stackopolis
description: Recreate the blueprint pattern on the main game board to complete each level.

name: Stan Skates
description: Help Stan take on the streets and survive the grittiness of the city.

name: Starship Eleven
description: Choose from two spaceships and explore over 30 strange worlds.

name: Starship Seven
description: Pilot your ship safely through the levels.

name: Stay the Distance
description: Study the field, pick a horse and see if you can stay the distance.

name: Street Fight
description: Obama and Hillary fight it out in hand-to-hand combat.

name: Stunt Pilot
description: Be the best Stunt Pilot and complete all the courses without crashing!

name: Sub Commander
description: Guide your submarine through the treacherous waters - avoiding the obstacles.

controls.mouse-left: Hold to rise, release to dive
controls.mouse: Move to right side to go faster, left to go slower

name: Sudoku
description: Play this fantastic puzzle game that is taking the world by storm - New puzzles every day!

name: Surf's Up
description: Surf for all you're worth. Pull off jumps & tricks

name: Sushi Go Round
description: You are the replacement Chef, you have a 1-week trial to use the correct recipes and serve the customers in the Sushi Restaurant.

name: T. or Treat Smash
description: Smash up the fruit, using all the bonuses you can.

name: Tabletop Cricket
description: It's the final of the 2005 Ashes. Have you got what it take to step on to the Pitch and win for your country? Hit Sixes and bowl out the opposition.

controls.mouse-left: Set power and aim, release to throw

name: Tanked Up
description: Blast your way around 8 action packed tracks and destroy the opposition tanks.

name: Tarnation
description: Send your flowers into battle and stop the Tar Bugs attacking the garden water supply!

controls.mouse-left: Select down-left to up-right to make yellow flowers.

name: Tennis Ace
description: Beat all three challengers and take home the Gold Cup.

name: The Ashes
description: Destiny is in your hands as you lead your country to the crease to claw back a victory from the jaws of defeat.

controls.arrows: Batting: Hold down Arrow Keys and press K or L to hit the ball.

name: The Old West
description: Clear the town of the Bad Guys.

name: The Old West 2
description: Clear the town of the Bad Guys.

name: Thin Ice
description: Use you skater to cut holes in the ice to trap the monsters in the water!

name: Thunder Plunder
description: Borg the Viking has a liking for plundering. Help him to collect the booty whilst avoiding traps and enemies.

name: Tiger Golf
description: Take on the tricks and traps of this fiendish golf course, play as a Tiger!

name: Top Cop
description: Capture the robbers and recover as much loot as you can!

name: Traps, Mines, Sheep
description: Avoid the traps, try to hit the mines and get as far as possible.

controls.mouse-left: Give the sheep a little boost

name: Trapshoot
description: Prove that you're the sharpest shooter.

name: Trials 2
description: Amazing real-life 3D trials game. Negotiate obstacles in the quickest time!

name: Trials Dynamite
description:
Try to inflict as much damage to the driver as possible for maximum damage points!

Don't forget to buy the full version of Trials 2: Second Edition, to get the full 3d experience.

name: Tribe
description: Take part in the ritual contest to become the new village chief and win the heart of Princess Fabiola.

name: Trivia Machine
description: Climb to the top of the ladder by answering fun questions from the trivia machine! The game features thousands of trivia questions across 9 fun categories.

name: Twiddlestix
description: Navigate your way safely through the waterways without hitting the sides.

name: Twisted City
description:
Now’s your chance to see what it’s like to be a wicked Twisted bar!  Cause mayhem in Twisted City by flinging your goo as far as you can. There’s all sorts of things to help you – or not – on the way. And watch out – make the wrong move and you might even start going backwards.
 
Have fun in Twisted City!

name: UFO Joe
description: UFO Joe and his fellow aliens are bored. To rectify the situation, UFO Joe has been given the task of collecting mysterious creatures for the local Zoo. That'll put the fun back in alien life!

name: United We Dance
description: You control Britney & Bush as they hit the dance floor!

name: Vectoroids
description: Zap everything that moves and collect power-ups in this frantic shooter!

name: Wacky Ballz
description: Guide your Wacky Ball and collect all the stars before the time runs out.

name: Wakeboarding XS
description: Pull the most extreme moves and score the most points.

controls.mouse-left: Hold to power up, release to jump

name: Western
description: Shoot all the bad guys, being careful not to shoot any innocent bystanders.

name: Whack a Ground Hog
description: Whack as many ground hogs as you can before the time runs out.

name: Wheels of Salvation
description: Use the Wheels of Salvation to help Dr Carter escape the pit of Endless Torment.

name: Winter Workout
description: Help Santa complete four winter themed events and lose some weight.

controls.null: See in game for full instructions

name: Word Sailing
description: Make words into wind and cross the finish line first!

controls.mouse-left: Click or Type letters to make a word, then click ENTER

name: Word Vine
description: Place word on the vine and link every word to finish the level!

name: World Domination 2
description: Use your resources to battle the other World Leaders for World Domination!

name: Yo–gos Rollers
description: Draw paths with your mouse and help Yo-Guy get from the platform to the exit!

name: Youda Camper
description: Create, design and manage your own campsite and become the best campsite owner in the world

name: Zed
description: Find enough gold to build a fine shiny space suit.

name: Zubo Zurfing
description:
Get 5 Zubos from one side of the soundwave to the other, be sure to collect the key and avoid the Zombos!

Move your mouse above or below the sound wave, hold down your mouse to build up power and release a sound bomb.
